newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Nov 27.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Nov 27.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on Novovember 27:

WASHINGTON - Florida Rock Industries Inc., one of the largest concrete manufacturers on the East Coast, joined forces with an African-American contractor in what some now say is a misapplication of affirmative action policy.
NEW YORK - The Dow Jones industrial average has leapt higher as investors flock to high-quality stocks.
WASHINGTON - A tiny start-up company hopes to deliver large software programs directly to personal computers via technology called "Castanets."
WASHINGTON - Bell Atlantic Corp. plans to take over management of a large and troubled cellular telephone company in Mexico and pump in $200 million in equity and loans.
